comments.purpose: Client-side uploader/downloader - monitors local data_dir, auto-uploads to satellites for backup, downloads on-demand for recovery
comments.onboarding: 1. Copy this file to ~/.libremesh/config.json  2. Edit ONLY data_dir (local folder to back up)  3. Start: python feeder.py
comments.encryption_key: Auto-generated on first start and saved to this config.json. Losing this key makes recovery impossible; back up config.json safely.
comments.origin_host: Pre-configured for production (static public IP); edit only if testing against different origin
comments.default_satellite: Optional uplink hint; feeder auto-selects best satellite based on zone/reachability
